## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [limit?](./influxdb-client-apis.getchecksrequest.limit.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Limits the number of records returned. Default is <code>20</code>. |
